graphql.query:
query inventorySources {
    inventorySources (
        first:11
        page: 1
        input: {
        # id: 1
        # code: "Test"
        # name: "custom"
        # status: true
    }) {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            contactName
            contactEmail
            contactNumber
            contactFax
            country
            state
            city
            street
            postcode
            priority
            latitude
            longitude
            status
        }
    }
}

query inventorySource {
    inventorySource(id: 1) {
        id
        code
        name
        description
        contactName
        contactEmail
        contactNumber
        contactFax
        country
        state
        city
        street
        postcode
        priority
        latitude
        longitude
        status
    }
}

mutation createInventorySource {
    createInventorySource(input: {
        code: "ncr",
        name: "NCRStore",
        description: "test"
        contactName: "TomMartin",
        contactEmail: "tom@example.com",
        contactNumber: "4792645441",
        contactFax: "676767",
        street: "1217 Ocello Street",
        country: "US",
        state: "Arkansas",
        city: "HARRELL",
        postcode: "71745",
        priority: 3,
        latitude: "123.123.123.123",
        longitude: "444.444.444.444",
        status: false
    }) {
        id
        code
        name
        description
        contactName
        contactEmail
        contactNumber
        contactFax
        country
        state
        city
        street
        postcode
        priority
        latitude
        longitude
        status
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        success
    }
}

mutation updateInventorySource {
    updateInventorySource(id: 3, input: {
        code: "ncrss",
        name: "NCR Store",
        description: "test"
        contactName: "Tom Martin",
        contactEmail: "tom@example.com",
        contactNumber: "479-264-5441",
        contactFax: "676767",
        street: "1217 Ocello Street",
        country: "US",
        state: "Arkansas",
        city: "HARRELL",
        postcode: "71745",
        priority: 2,
        latitude: "444.444.444.444",
        longitude: "123.123.123.123",
        status: true
    }) {
        id
        code
        name
        description
        contactName
        contactEmail
        contactNumber
        contactFax
        country
        state
        city
        street
        postcode
        priority
        latitude
        longitude
        status
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        success
    }
}

query channels {
    channels (
        first:11
        page: 1
    ) {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            timezone
            theme
            hostname
            logoUrl
            faviconUrl
            homeSeo {
                metaTitle
                metaKeywords
                metaDescription
            }
            isMaintenanceOn
            allowedIps
            rootCategoryId
            defaultLocaleId
            baseCurrencyId
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            maintenanceModeText
            description
            locales {
                id
                code
                name
                direction
                logoUrl
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
            defaultLocale {
                id
                code
                name
                direction
                logoUrl
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
            currencies {
                id
                code
                name
                symbol
                decimal
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                exchangeRate {
                    id
                    targetCurrency
                    rate
                    createdAt
                    updatedAt
                    currency {
                        id
                    }
                }
            }
            baseCurrency {
                id
                code
                name
                symbol
                decimal
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                exchangeRate {
                    id
                    targetCurrency
                    rate
                    createdAt
                    updatedAt
                    currency {
                        id
                    }
                }
            }
            inventorySources {
                id
                code
                name
                description
                contactName
                contactEmail
                contactNumber
                contactFax
                country
                state
                city
                street
                postcode
                priority
                latitude
                longitude
                status
            }
            rootCategory {
                id
            }
        }
    }
}

query channel {
    channel(id: 1) {
        id
        code
        name
        description
        timezone
        theme
        hostname
        logoUrl
        faviconUrl
        homeSeo {
            metaTitle
            metaKeywords
            metaDescription
        }
        isMaintenanceOn
        allowedIps
        rootCategoryId
        defaultLocaleId
        baseCurrencyId
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        maintenanceModeText
        description
        locales {
            id
            code
            name
            direction
            logoUrl
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        defaultLocale {
            id
            code
            name
            direction
            logoUrl
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        currencies {
            id
            code
            name
            symbol
            decimal
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            exchangeRate {
                id
                targetCurrency
                rate
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                currency {
                    id
                }
            }
        }
        baseCurrency {
            id
            code
            name
            symbol
            decimal
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            exchangeRate {
                id
                targetCurrency
                rate
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                currency {
                    id
                }
            }
        }
        inventorySources {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            contactName
            contactEmail
            contactNumber
            contactFax
            country
            state
            city
            street
            postcode
            priority
            latitude
            longitude
            status
        }
        rootCategory {
            id
        }
    }
}

mutation createChannel {
    createChannel(input: {

        theme

        logoUrl
        faviconUrl
        homeSeo {
            metaTitle
            metaKeywords
            metaDescription
        }
        isMaintenanceOn
        allowedIps
        rootCategoryId
        defaultLocaleId
        baseCurrencyId
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        maintenanceModeText
        description
        locales {
            id
            code
            name
            direction
            logoUrl
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        defaultLocale {
            id
            code
            name
            direction
            logoUrl
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        currencies {
            id
            code
            name
            symbol
            decimal
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            exchangeRate {
                id
                targetCurrency
                rate
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                currency {
                    id
                }
            }
        }
        baseCurrency {
            id
            code
            name
            symbol
            decimal
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            exchangeRate {
                id
                targetCurrency
                rate
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                currency {
                    id
                }
            }
        }
        inventorySources {
            id
            code
            name
            description
            contactName
            contactEmail
            contactNumber
            contactFax
            country
            state
            city
            street
            postcode
            priority
            latitude
            longitude
            status
        }
        rootCategory {
            id
        }
        success
    }
}

mutation userLogin($input: CreateUserLoginInput!) {
    userLogin(input: $input) {
        status
        success
        accessToken
        tokenType
        expiresIn
        user {
            id
            name
            email
            password
            apiToken
            roleId
            image
            status
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            role {
                name
                description
                permissionType
                permissions
            }
        }
    }
}

query users {
    users( 
        first:20
        page: 1
        input: {
        # id: 1
        # name: "Tom Martin"
        # email: "tom_martin@example.com"
        # roleId: 1
        # role: "Administrator"
        # status: true
    }) {
        paginatorInfo {
            count
            currentPage
            lastPage
            total
        }
        data {
            id
            name
            email
            password
            apiToken
            status
            roleId
            image
            rememberToken
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            role {
                id
                name
                description
                permissionType
                permissions
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
        }
    }
}

query user {
    user(id: 1) {
        id
        name
        email
        password
        apiToken
        status
        roleId
        image
        rememberToken
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        role {
            id
            name
            description
            permissionType
            permissions
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
    }
}

mutation createUser ($input : CreateUserInput!){
    createUser(input: $input) {
        id
        name
        email
        password
        apiToken
        status
        roleId
        image
        rememberToken
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        role {
            id
            name
            description
            permissionType
            permissions
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        success
    }
}

mutation updateUser {
    updateUser(id: 2, input: {
        name: "Admin2"
        email: "admin2@example.com"
        password: "admin123"
        passwordConfirmation: "admin123"
        roleId: 1
        status: true
        image: "https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2017/05/23/10/53/t-shirt-design-2336850_960_720.jpg"
    }) {
        id
        name
        email
        password
        apiToken
        status
        roleId
        image
        rememberToken
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        role {
            id
            name
            description
            permissionType
            permissions
            createdAt
            updatedAt
        }
        success
    }
}

mutation createRole {
    createRole(input: {
        name: "Testing Again"
        description: "TEST CASES IS CHECKED"
        # Value sholud be
        # CUSTOM or ALL
        permissionType: CUSTOM
        permissions: [
            "catalog",
            "catalog.families",
            "catalog.families.edit",
            "customers",
            "customers.customers",
            "customers.customers.create",
            "customers.customers.delete",
            "customers.groups",
            "customers.groups.create",
            "customers.groups.edit",
            "customers.groups.delete",
            "customers.reviews",
            "customers.reviews.edit",
            "customers.reviews.delete"
        ]
    }) {
        id
        name
        description
        permissionType
        permissions
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        success
    }
}
